title: nasus too op
body: anybody else feel that they cant do anything about nasus now, like its kinda stupid n busted how he can get up to 400 stacks at like 13 mins. nasus really needs a nerf b4 i punch my moniter

replies.body:
And nasus reaches a 50% winrate for the first time in.. how long?

He is actually decent now, not a free lane win. Time to learn how to actually lane against him.
